result.name: housing-development-boundaries-local-plan-2007-policy-hg-4-hg-6-core-strategy-2014-policy-b1-ke
result.notes: Local Plan adopted 2007 (HG.4, HG.6), Core Strategy adopted 2014 (B1, KE1, RA1, RA2). The boundary which defines that part of certain settlements within which the principle of residential development will usually be acceptable.

organization.name: bath-and-north-east-somerset-council
organization.title: Bath and North East Somerset Council
organization.description: BANES Council is a Unitary Local Government Authority covering Bath and the North East corner of Somerset, west of Bath, including Keynsham, Midsomer Norton, Radstock and Peasedown St John.
